title: Poppy is still listed as an assassin in the store [Store]
body:
Poppy {{champion:78}} - the tank/fighter is still listed (for like 2 years since her rework) as an assassin in the store.

steps:
1. log into the client
2. go to store
3. tag assassin (also tag include owned if you own her) and you will see her

People already made threads talking about it but nothing was done with it - [for example](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/B0AIGVHp-client-poppy-is-listed-as-an-assassin-in-the-store)

but for some reason, it didn't get fixed yet.

replies.body: Buy a {{item:3147}} on Poppy and I swear youâ€™ll practically be an assassin.
wait what, i only use her as an assassin lol
but assassin poppy is so much fun
